data.title: Jackson, Etti & Edu
data.meta_description: Jackson, Etti & Edu is a leading full-service commercial law firm rendering legal services to a broad spectrum of local and international clientele in diverse areas of law.
data.meta_site_name: Jackson, Etti & Edu - Jackson, Etti & Edu is a leading full-service commercial law firm rendering legal services to a broad spectrum of local and international clientele in diverse areas of law.
data.text:
Notes

Following its split from Sudan in 2011, trademark applications in South Sudan are now administered through the Ministry of Justice in Juba which is guided by the Sudan Trade Marks Act of 1969.

Documents required FOR TRADE MARK Applications

Power of Attorney, incorporating an Arabic translation, either on the letterhead of the applicant, signed and stamped; or signed and notarized.

15 prints.

Certificate of Incorporation/Extract from Commercial Register, with verified English translation.#

Priority document (if applicable), with verified English translation.

Documents required For Renewals

Power of Attorney, incorporating an Arabic translation, either on the letterhead of the applicant, signed and stamped; or signed and notarized.

N.B. Registered User entries must also be renewed.

Documents required for Assignments/Mergers

Power of Attorney, incorporating an Arabic translation, either on the letterhead of the applicant, signed and stamped; or signed and notarized.

In the case of a merger: Certificate of Merger, with verified English translation.#

In the case of an assignment:

FORM TM11.#

FORM TM12 signed before a Notary Public.#

Certificate of Incorporation/Extract from Commercial Register relating to the assignee, with verified English translation.#

Deed of Assignment, with verified English translation (must be recorded within 6 months of the effective date).#

Documents required for Change of Name

Power of Attorney, incorporating an Arabic translation, either on the letterhead of the applicant, signed and stamped; or signed and notarized.

Certificate of Change of Name, with verified English translation.*

Documents required for Change of Address

Power of Attorney, incorporating an Arabic translation, either on the letterhead of the applicant, signed and stamped; or signed and notarized.

Documents required For Licenses/Registered Users

Power of Attorney, incorporating an Arabic translation, either on the letterhead of the applicant, signed and stamped; or signed and notarized.

Declaration and Statement of Case, with verified English translation.#

License Agreement, with verified English translation.#

# To be legalised up to a Sudanese Consul
